items.sentence: Tell Tom I\'ll be ready by the time he gets here.
You\'re expected to do that as well, aren\'t you?
Tom knew right away that something wasn\'t right.
Tom is not very likely to be at tonight\'s party.
Tom doesn\'t play the cello as well as Mary does.
Tom hasn\'t practiced the piano at all this week.
I still don\'t know who I\'m supposed to talk to.
I still don\'t quite understand what\'s going on.
Tom noticed Mary the moment she entered the room.
Tom is having problems with one of his neighbors.
I don\'t want anybody in my room while I\'m away.
Everyone looked at Tom as if he\'d lost his mind.
Tom couldn\'t decide what he should buy for Mary.
Tom couldn\'t figure out how to solve the puzzle.
I think Tom isn\'t going to do that anytime soon.
Tom thinks that doing that may not be a bad idea.
Tom won\'t tell me who gave him those binoculars.
You and Tom are really good friends, aren\'t you?
You don\'t want to hang out with people like Tom.
Even though it\'s a bit cold, let\'s go swimming.
I asked Tom what time he was planning on leaving.
They think Tom followed Mary home and killed her.
I assume you\'re not interested in going with us.
Do you think Tom would care if I didn\'t do that?
I met Tom when I was singing in a club in Boston.
What brand of popcorn do you think pops the best?
Police used rubber bullets to subdue the rioters.
The last time I played baseball, I hit a homerun.
Mary\'s husband told that me she wasn\'t at home.
I suspect that Tom and Mary are both over thirty.
I suspect that Tom and Mary are ready to do that.
I suspect that Tom and Mary are right about that.
You know I used to have one of those, don\'t you?
I think that it\'s unlikely Tom will get elected.
Tom certainly isn\'t as healthy as he used to be.
Let\'s get some brochures from the travel bureau.
Are you going to be in Australia on October 20th?
Do you remember the first time you were arrested?
Why don\'t you folks make yourselves comfortable?
I hear that Tom is planning to retire in October.
Tom didn\'t know he no longer needed to be there.
I wouldn\'t allow Tom to do what he wanted to do.
I wouldn\'t have said anything to Tom about that.
I\'m looking for someone to do my laundry for me.
If you need money, then why don\'t you get a job?
You\'re too young to be doing this kind of thing.
You\'re very fortunate to have such good friends.
Where can I find a coffee shop that\'s open late?
I\'ll call Tom tomorrow and work out the details.
Tom didn\'t know where Mary bought her groceries.
